text: These are the official results of the Men's Decathlon competition at the 1993 World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany. There were a total number of 25 participating athletes, including three non-finishers. The competition started on Thursday August 19, 1993, and ended on Friday August 20, 1993. The gold medal was won by Dan O'Brien of the United States with a score of 8891 points. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Dan O'Brien United States (USA) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Eduard Hämäläinen Belarus (BLR) |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Paul Meier Germany (GER) |} ==Schedule== :August 19 :
